sentences.sContent: The European powers extended their authority in Asia.
sentences.sContent_eng: The European powers extended their authority in Asia.
sentences.sCn: 欧洲列强在亚洲扩大他们的管辖权。

sentences.sContent: The teacher chalked out a map of Asia on the blackboard.
sentences.sContent_eng: The teacher chalked out a map of Asia on the blackboard.
sentences.sCn: 老师用粉笔在黑板上画了一张亚洲地图。

sentences.sContent: His extensive experience in other parts of Asia helped him to overcome cultural barriers.
sentences.sContent_eng: His extensive experience in other parts of Asia helped him to overcome cultural barriers.
sentences.sCn: 在亚洲其他地区的广泛经历帮助他克服了文化障碍。
